sub_title: Supply Chain Marketplace Operations Lead at Nike EHQ
summary: Experienced high-performing project and operations professional. Specializing in business support, project coordination, account & order management, and process optimization. Proven abilities to bring positive results through cross-functional collaboration and critical thinking while delivering solutions on what's right for the consumer and the business.

profile_positions.description:
—	Execute efficient order management to plan and deliver to plan for Nike store operations.
—	Responsible for oversight on accurate and timely delivery of product with our distribution and carrier teams.
—	Represent operations within the cross-functional team to ensure a balanced marketplace, mutual profitable growth and effective mechanics of inventory management. 
—	Regular interaction with internal and external partners within a matrix environment, sharing scenarios and solutions to risks/opportunities from a supply chain perspective.
—	Lead and influence cross functional peers in professional discussions and often complex decisions to optimize demand fulfillment.
—	Deliver service excellence for stores portfolio to ensure reliability in collaboration with key cross- functional stakeholders.
—	Drive speed-to-market improvements, reliability initiatives and focus on elevating the consumer experience.
profile_positions.title: EMEA Marketplace Operations Lead - NSO

profile_positions.description:
—	Manage Pre-Season Execution within Account, Channel and Seasonal teams  
—	Monitor, leverage and improve KPI's to maximize service & drive business decisions
—	Ensure quality, on-time relevant information is in place to ensure transparency and visibility for external/internal partners 
—	Deliver against efficient order management processes to plan/deliver seasons by maximizing order books  
—	Support financial objectives set by the business (Maintaining shippable status, researching freight opportunities, account booking vs target assessments, inbound delivery flow and on-time delivery tracking, etc) 
—	Be a SME for operations within Account, Channel and Seasonal partners 
—	Analyze and prepare information for cross-functional account business reviews
—	Drive continuous process improvement & support operational partners in capability building projects
—	Support current/new team projects and provide peer mentorship and training
profile_positions.title: North America Marketplace Operations Lead

profile_positions.description:
—	Manage execution of Global Product Attribution Seasonal Readiness: Obtain Global Buys from all geo business partners and affiliates, collect upstream data, verify category products are attributed, reviewed and validated
—	Ensuring cross category and size run validation is completed by the team, and geo hand-over is completed each season
—	Engage with product partners to coordinate and execute; internal tool capabilities while gathering and prioritizing requirements, and relaying communications of changes/upgrades, and/or divestitures functionalities
—	Monitor seasonal readiness and daily late-adds and/or late-buys, as well as ad-hoc attribute request, image validation, product color associations, sizing, and ensuring no products are live without a review/approval process
—	Collaborate with 3rd Party Vendors and Integrated Partner Programs to ensure products are set-up correctly and buyable for consumers
—	Ensure Nike.com experiences are premium and personal to consumers, across all Nike digital platforms
—	Develop and socialize 1-2 year strategy with partners/geos and leadership teams
—	Manage and help prioritized tech producer workload, roles, and responsibilities as needed
profile_positions.title: Global Digital Product Catalog Attribution Lead

profile_positions.description:
—	Project management coordination; partnering cross-functionally within digital experience operations across global and remote geo teams to support initiatives for Nike direct digital commerce (NDDC)
—	Be the conduit for connecting the appropriate teams together to reduce friction on consumer experiences
—	Provide support on operational process improvements, product seasonal readiness, analyzing data, and consumer insights for upcoming seasons and product launch
—	Lead and facilitate meetings with geographic operation teams and provide business updates or operational changes, while collecting new requirements for consumer business cases
—	Tracking new features, managing backlog, intake requests and prioritization
profile_positions.title: Global Digital Operations Technical Producer

profile_positions.description:
—	Provide leadership guidance, personnel oversight, scheduling, workload coordination, and productivity review of employees 
—	Conduct 1:1 check-ins for employee touch points, recognition, coaching, and development 
—	Facilitate team huddles to ensure productivity is in alignment with SLAs, team goals and company initiatives 
—	Collaborate with department managers on process optimization 
—	Coordinate and drive department work groups on continuous improvement projects
—	Provide training support for new and/or existing team members in classroom setting
—	Assist with customer escalation through phone support and/or web messaging
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager - Customer Support

profile_positions.description:
—	Provide support through email, phone calls, and Zendesk tickets
—	Assist with product information across all Columbia products 
—	Handle daily purchases, follow-ups, order updates, customer issues or discrepancies 
—	Mentor and provide support to new trainees during transition from classroom to production
profile_positions.title: Ecommerce Specialist

profile_positions.description:
—	Provide project scope guidance to ensure correct requirements are developed w/other depts 
—	Prioritize deliverables for project coordinators to ensure timely execution of assignments 
—	Lead conversations cross-functionally when implementing new projects & processes
—	Stretch into multiple departments to further develop business knowledge/skills 
—	Worked w/other departments on cross-functional operations with VSM & agile methodology
—	Partner with development teams to define product impact and customer experience
—	Optimize & streamline customers’ reporting by deploying a user-friendly web-portal
—	Deliver presentations evaluating potential risks thru critical thinking, data reports & analytics 
—	Responsible for delivering weekly updates to executives and senior management 
—	Review internal process and ensure SOP documents meet ISO 9001 quality standards
—	Evaluate Key Performance Indicators to measure trends for improvements thru reporting
—	Assist w/implementation of internal QA process to evaluate agent success & quality
profile_positions.title: Project Coordination Manager

profile_positions.description:
—	Manage & lead dept. meetings, 1:1 check-ins with leads, and direction with daily operations
—	Assist Sr. Manager and Directors with disseminating policy changes within dept.
—	Build deployment plan of CRM system migration of Salesforce to Epicor
—	Support Account Managers in the field on internal policies, procedures and best practices
—	Provide Excel monthly activity reports for facilities POCs utilizing the RAPIDGate program
—	Evaluate, QA, upload data reports provided by facility security POC of civilian exception list
profile_positions.title: Program Support Manager

profile_positions.description:
—	Assist team leads w/managing call support teams, work distribution, coaching, & escalations
—	Provide management assistance on Tier-1 strategic accounts on complex support inquiries 
—	Evaluate, review, and process agent timecards through Paycom
profile_positions.title: Customer Support Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
—	Provide direction from management to the inbound call agents & operation support
—	Assist with coordinating agent workload with assisting on task or deliverables
—	Designated as the first point of contact for escalated customer cases
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Representative Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
—	Assist w/customer complaints & provide troubleshooting support by email, phone or on-site
—	Manage relationships w/Tier-1 clients & prospective government and commercial customers
—	Travel to client offices to provide direct service support to maintain positive customer experience
profile_positions.title: Senior Customer Service Representative

volunteer_experiences.description:
—	Demonstrate passion for member’s health and fitness goals
—	Provide in-depth knowledge of CrossFit, physical movements, mobility, nutrition, and fitness
—	Responsible for communicating gym updates with social media platforms 
—	Manage daily office operations, class times, coaching schedules, & product inventory
—	Design weekly/monthly workout programs for classes and members

Teamed up with other church members to visit China and volunteer at one of Beijing’s English Total Immersion Program for 2 weeks to help adults, young and old with English speaking skills through assisting as a teacher-aid on English curriculum.

United together with a handful of young adults to volunteer and travel to Sierra Leone, Africa, for 2 weeks to reach out and educate impoverished kids and communities in remote areas outside of the capital of Freetown.
